function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to close interactions between food truck owners and customers","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission leading to community spread","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, promote contactless transactions, and enforce social distancing measures","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, UV disinfection systems, and mobile ordering platforms","People":"Food truck owners, customers, community members","Owner":"Food truck owners, local health authorities"},{"Description":"Disruption of routines and establishment of new ones in response to the pandemic","Impact":"Loss of predictability and stability, potential for increased stress and anxiety","Mitigation":"Provide support for creating new routines, offer mental health resources, and promote stability through consistent services","Technologies":"Online scheduling and reminder systems, mental health apps, and communication platforms","People":"Food truck owners, customers, community members","Owner":"Food truck owners, mental health organizations, community support groups"},{"Description":"Adaptation of servicescapes to accommodate changes during the pandemic","Impact":"Potential for increased interactions and exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Optimize layout for social distancing, prioritize outdoor seating, and enhance ventilation systems","Technologies":"Mobile barriers, air purifiers, and outdoor heating solutions","People":"Food truck owners, customers, community members","Owner":"Food truck owners, local health authorities, city planners"}]}
